title: Lowest Military Expenditure as a Percentage of GDP
description: In 2023, Haiti allocated only 0.05% of its GDP to military expenditure, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Minimal Armed Forces Personnel
description: As of 2020, only 0.02% of Haiti's total labor force was part of the armed forces, indicating a minimal military presence.

title: High Proportion of Female-Headed Households
description: In 2017, 45.1% of households in Haiti were headed by females, reflecting a significant role of women in household leadership.

title: Low Consumption of Iodized Salt
description: Only 7.5% of households in Haiti consumed iodized salt in 2017, one of the lowest rates globally, raising concerns about iodine deficiency.
